taskDefinition.name: Kinetic Request CE Notification Template Send
taskDefinition.author: support@kineticdata.com
taskDefinition.description: Retrieves and combines all template content (headers, footers, snippets), performs dynamic content replacements and sends the message.

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The id of the space from which the submission is being retrieved.

parameter.label: Recipient Json Object
parameter.tooltip: The recipient object should look like this. {"type":"user","username":"test@mycompany.com","smtpaddress":{"to":"to_test@mycompany.com","cc":"cc_test@mycompany.com","bcc":"bcc_test@mycompany.com"},"language":"- Default -","email notifications":"yes"}

parameter.label: Notification Template Name
parameter.tooltip: The notification template name being used.

parameter.label: Replacement Values
parameter.tooltip: JSON string of replacement values. Required to successfully apply replacements to any notification template. JSON keys can be 'form', 'values', and 'vars'.

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: Needed if the message contains attachments.
